author: Arjun Neil Alim, Arjun Neil Alim
title: My trouble in paradise shows that coronavirus can strike anywhere – it is a threat we have to face together
description: As Britons return home from abroad, getting used to the lockdown in the UK is important
content:
Trouble in paradise began with a tap on the shoulder. Theres a situation I have to update you on, the commercial director of Gili Lankanfushi said with characteristic professionalism as I was strapping on my snorkel.
The authorities have just stopped anyone … [+4244 chars]
